summary: Black Widow re textured Nightingale Armour
descriptionHtml:
Armor is standalone! No longer replaces Nightingale; now called 'Black Widow'.
Feel free to rename, as the set is enchanted.
All three pieces can only be crafted at the Sky Forge with Leather & Leather Strips.
All three pieces can be improved at a Workbench with said materials.

**************************************************
Description:This is a Black variant of the Nightingale armor set based on Black Widow's Costume , utilizing the Lace Variant meshes.
(Huge thanks to DizzasterJuice for their work on the Lace Variant, respectively.)
**************************************************
This is for Female Only.

**************************************************
Installation:
Simply extract the archive into the Skyrim folder, so the .esp, textures folder, and meshes folder all land into your skyrim/data directory.
Typically:
C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim

C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim


Credits:
DizzasterJuice for his work and knowledge on transparencies.
author: wanoo99
